download.title: Get the BXHealth App
download.content: A faster, easier way to access all your accounts from anywhere.

confirmation.title: We've Created Your Account
confirmation.content:
You can now access your BXHealth accounts, events, and other tools online with your username and password.

Here's just a sample of the things you can do:

  • Access your BXHealth account
  • Review your benefits
  • Submit, review, and track claims
  • Schedule appointments, online or in the office
  • Browse member heathcare resources, like events and special offers

You can learn more about all the things you can do, or simply sign in below.
